title: Pilot
description: Jamie, a talented performer, dreams of success while working at an aging Los Angeles hotel.

title: The Bad Seed
description: Jamie tries to impress Fancy by becoming a mentor to Nelson, an innocent-looking kid. However, Nelson starts stealing various things from the hotel and letting Jamie take the blame. Orlando Brown guest stars.

title: Burned Twice by the Same Flame
description: Jamie foolishly believes that his engaged ex-girlfriend is in town to see him and so he asks Fancy to pretend to be his girlfriend.

title: Who's Da Man?
description: Jamie coaches Braxton on how to attract women--with unexpected results.

title: We Finally Got a Piece of the Pie
description: Jamie and Junior decide to start a business selling Helen's sweet potato pies. However, just when the business is about to take off, Jamie eats all of the orders.

title: And Bubba Makes Three
description: Braxton is embarrassed by his parents, who come to visit him and end up getting along better with Jamie than with their own son. Later at a banquet in Braxton's honor, its members insult his parents.

title: Stuck on You
description: Junior entrusts Helen's wedding ring to Jamie's care after he decides to have it reconditioned for their anniversary. Jamie shows the ring off to Fancy and Braxton but when Helen comes, he slips it onto Fancy's finger, to keep from ruining the surprise. The ring gets stuck.

title: Kiss & Tell
description: At a Halloween masquerade party, Jamie mistakes Fancy for his date.

title: Seems Like Old Times
description: Jamie is torn between his opportunity to get his career off the ground and his loyalty to his uncle Junior when he catches an entertainment attorney friend of Junior's trying to coerce Helen into an affair. Lou Myers guest stars.

title: A Star Is Almost Born
description: A martial arts film director convinces Helen to let him film a movie in her hotel. However, after Jamie knocks out one of the actors, the director casts Jamie in the role of the bad guy who is always getting beat up by the good guy. Jamie and the rest of the hotel crew soon tire of the director's rude behavior. Alec Mapa guest stars.

title: A Killer Ending
description: Jamie suspects that one of their hotel guests is an infamous serial killer.

title: A Thanksgiving to Remember
description: When a promotional scheme goes awry, Jamie and the others learn the meaning of giving thanks.

title: I am What I Scam
description: Jamie gets jealous when Fancy's rich ex-boyfriend shows up at the hotel with a diamond ring and a proposal.

title: I Do, I Didn't
description: Jamie wakes up with a sexy woman--who is marrying someone else that day.

title: Little Red Corvette
description: Jamie buys a fancy sports car from a disreputable character and regrets it.

title: Act Like You Love Me
description: A movie actress friend of Helen's comes on to Jamie while she is in town teaching an acting seminar. Janet Hubert-Whitten guest stars.

title: Westside
description: Jamie finds it hard to follow Junior and Helen's rule to have no wild parties when they leave to go on vacation and the Westside Connection (Ice Cube, Mack10, and WC) comes to stay in the hotel.

title: The Young and the Meatless
description: Jamie may have to eat his words after he tells Fancy that he is a vegetarian and later is offered a job as spokesman for a hamburger restaurant.

title: Step Up to Get Beat Down
description: Jamie suspects that he is being blackmailed by a record company owner and decides to cause a little trouble of his own. Tony Cox guest stars.

title: Break Yourself, Fool
description: Jamie is held hostage in a bank robbery.

title: I've Fallen and I Won't Get Up
description: When a guest fakes an injury so she can sue the hotel, Jamie must expose her lies.

title: Save the Drama for Your Mama
description: Jamie's estranged mother returns--and so do Jamie's unresolved feelings. Singer GLADYS KNIGHT guest stars and performs.

title: Freezer Burn
description: The hotel is selected as the site of a televised pool party, but Jamie, Braxton and Fancy may not live to enjoy it. Radio personalities THE BAKA BOYZ guest star.

title: The Accused
description: Braxton becomes Jamie's prime suspect after a robbery at the hotel.

title: The Employee Formerly Known as Prince
description: An African prince wants to marry Fancy.

title: One Flew Over the County's Nest
description: After a mishap, Jamie ends up in the mental ward of a dubious hospital.

title: Is She Is, or Is She Ain't?
description: Jamie knows a secret about Braxton's girlfriend. Helen discovers Junior's newest vice.

title: Do the Write Thing
description: Jamie sells his TV script to a Hollywood agent. Anthony Michael Hall, Chris Parnell, and Steve White all guest star in this episode.

title: Misery Loves Company
description: On Halloween, a spooky hotel guest wants Jamie to be her eternal husband. Junior and Helen get more than they expected at a lovers' retreat. Halloween episode

title: Dog Pounded
description: Jamie gets into trouble while caring for a celebrity dog.

title: Mo' Money, Mo' Problems
description: After Jamie and the hotel staff split the winnings from a large lottery prize, each learns a lesson about greed.

title: Traffic School Daze
description: Jamie and Braxton go to traffic school. Mark Curry guest stars.

title: Too Much Soul Food
description: Jamie suspects that Junior is having health problems and convinces him to go to the hospital. Rondell Sheridan guest stars.

title: Super Face Off
description: Jamie's look-alike assumes his identity and hides at the hotel after robbing a jewelry store. Jamie Foxx plays a dual role.

title: Soul Mate to Cellmate
description: Jamie becomes enamored with a woman--until he finds out that she's married to a convict.

title: Papa Don't Preach
description: Jamie causes trouble between a talented singer and her overprotective preacher father. Recording artist MARY J. BLIGE performs an original song with series star JAMIE FOXX. Singer RONALD ISLEY guest stars.

title: Convent-ional Gifts
description: Jamie's bawdy present for Braxton winds up in the hands of Helen, who mistakes it for a gift she's giving a nun.

title: Passenger 187
description: Jamie and Braxton must control an airplane after the pilot loses consciousness. Helen tries to teach Junior how to use the hotel computer.

title: Ain't Nothin' Happenin' Cap'n
description: Fancy confuses Jamie by welcoming his romantic advances. Braxton tries popular psychology to get a date. Kellita Smith and Glenn Plummer guest star.

title: It's All Good, Fellas
description: Jamie's new mobster friend may do Jamie a favor he doesn't want. Eddie Mekka guest stars.

title: You Ain't Gotta Go Home, But...
description: After one too many all-night parties, Jamie is evicted from the hotel--and becomes roommates with Braxton.

title: The Afterschool Special
description: A boy decides to use a gun to stop a bully from bothering him. Robert Richard guest stars

title: I'm Too Sexy for This Shot
description: After Fancy poses for an unscrupulous photographer, Jamie and Braxton must prevent her worldwide exposure. Mark Curry guest stars.

title: How Jamie Got His Groove Back
description: As Jamie leaves for a lengthy performing tour, Fancy wonders how to tell him her true feelings for him. Singers K-CI & JO JO guest star.

title: Jamie Returns
description: Jamie might ruin his big opportunity in show business. Fancy doesn't wait for Jamie while he's gone.

title: Don't Hate the Player, Hate the Game
description: Jamie is delighted when Fancy thinks her boyfriend is cheating on her.

title: Men-o-pause
description: Jamie causes trouble when he interferes in Helen and Junior's relationship.

title: Swing Out Sister
description: Jamie tries to protect his younger sister when she gets invited to a wild party.

title: Is There a Doctor in the House?
description: Jamie is eager to pose as Fancy's doctor boyfriend at a reunion. Braxton hides his new romance.

title: Guess Who's Not Coming to Dinner?
description: Braxton must confront his true feelings for his girlfriend.

title: Just Don't Do It
description: Jamie disapproves of his mother's (JoMARIE PAYTON) young fianc (singer GERALD LEVERT).

title: We Got No Game
description: Jamie finds some tough competition when he coaches a youngsters' basketball team. Professional basketball players GARY PAYTON, SHAREEF ABDUR-RAHIM and VIN BAKER guest star as themselves.

title: The Lonesome Cow-Bro
description: Junior recounts how his ancestors founded their first hotel in the Old West. Series star JAMIE FOXX plays a dual role.

title: Christmas Day-Ja Vu
description: Jamie learns the true meaning of Christmas when he is forced to relive Christmas Eve over and over.

title: Taps for Royal
description: Jamie wants to reunite Junior with an old friend--but a long-standing feud causes trouble. Dancers BEN VEREEN and SAVION GLOVER guest star.

title: Bro-Jack
description: Jamie must find the art thief who hit an art auction at the King's Tower.

title: Scareder Than a Mug
description: Helen refuses to leave the hotel after being mugged. Jamie and Fancy start a business. Dawnn Lewis guest stars.

title: Forever Your Girl
description: Junior receives a startling visitor from his past.

title: Where There's a Will, Go the Other Way
description: Jamie becomes overconfident when he learns what he's getting in Helen and Junior's will.

title: Uncle Junior's Cabin
description: The hotel staff wants some time apart from each other--then why do they all end up stranded in the same isolated cabin?

title: Change of Heart
description: When Fancy and Silas appear on the game show "Change of Heart," hosted by CHRIS JAGGER (himself), they learn a lot about each other.

title: Fire and Desire: Part 1
description: Fancy has a surprising reaction to Jamie's new girlfriend. A major disaster occurs at the hotel. Part one of a two-part episode.

title: Fire and Desire: Part 2
description: Jamie becomes a hero--but does he really deserve the attention? Fancy's relationship with Silas changes.

title: Always Follow Your Heart
description: Fancy's prospective mother-in-law is unbearable. Jamie still loves Fancy.

title: Just Fancy
description: Jamie and Fancy share a memorable night--but sexy guest DEBBE DUNNING (herself) causes trouble.

title: Mr. Bo-Jingles
description: Fancy and Braxton receive promotions at the hotel--but not Jamie.

title: Poker Face
description: Fancy takes action when Jamie rejects her in favor of his poker game with the guys. Braxton wreaks computer chaos.

title: I Believe I Can Fly
description: Jamie makes a big effort for his first commercial jingle pitch. Fancy finds a novel way to bring business to the hotel.

title: Why Don't We Just Roll... Reversal
description: Jamie and Fancy learn about themselves during a disastrous role-playing game.

title: The Ugly Truth
description: Jamie questions whether a new hire's success is based on her talent or her looks.

title: Homie, Lover, Friend
description: Jamie recognizes the flirtatious methods of Fancy's former schoolmate.

title: Give Me Some Credit
description: Jamie must prove his worth to Fancy's wealthy parents (BILLY DAVIS JR. and MARILYN McCOO). Braxton faces a tough decision when the hotel exceeds its budget.

title: Liar, Liar, Pants on Fire
description: Jamie hides the reason for continually arriving home late and canceling dates with Fancy. Braxton steals an idea from Fancy.

title: Joy Ride
description: Jamie finds adventure when he takes Fancy's new luxury car out for a drive. Braxton causes an uproar among the hotel staff. TRACI BINGHAM guest stars.

title: Get Up, Stand Up
description: Jamie causes problems after advising Fancy to be more confrontational with her inconsiderate friend. Helen and Junior try to find a date for Braxton.

title: Super Ego
description: Series star JAMIE FOXX reunites with his fellow Any Given Sunday stars, professional football greats LAWRENCE TAYLOR and JAMIE WILLIAMS, along with football players CHARLES WOODSON, FRED WILLIAMSON and DARRELL RUSSELL (all playing themselves). When Fancy parties with the sports heroes, Jamie's ego gets him involved in a serious gridiron game against the professionals.

title: Family Business
description: Jamie gets into trouble when he demands payment for a jingle he wrote for the hotel.

title: Friendly Fire
description: Jamie is elated to be promoted at Jingles 2000--until he is ordered to terminate his friend.

title: Home Suite Home
description: Jamie's enthusiasm for his fancy new penthouse is dampened by Fancy's womanly decorating.

title: Behind the Jingle
description: Desperate Jamie steals his best friend's jingle--and suffers the consequences.

title: Partner fo' Life
description: A misunderstanding leads to Jamie being listed as his friend's "life partner" in hospital records.

title: Hot Coco on a Cold Night
description: When Fancy takes on a subservient persona, she discovers what Jamie really wants in a partner.

title: Rollin' in the Dough
description: Jamie wreaks havoc when he invades Braxton's investment club.

title: Musical Chairs
description: While replacing a missing accompanist, Jamie realizes that he wants to perform again--to Fancy's disappointment.

title: Jamie in the Middle
description: Rap stars METHOD MAN (himself) and REDMAN (himself) get Jamie into trouble when they both want to date Nicole.

title: I Second That Demo-tion
description: When Jamie is terminated from his jingle-writing job, he makes a major career decision--to Fancy's chagrin.

title: Roadtrip: Part 1
description: In Las Vegas, Jamie's career interferes with his and Fancy's relationship--especially after Nicole kisses him. Part one of a two-part episode.

title: Roadtrip: Part 2
description: Jamie must decide whether to ask Fancy to marry him or accompany Nicole on a performance tour of Europe. Part two of a two-part episode.

title: On Bended Knee
description: Jamie makes a major decision involving his career and love life, but confusion ensues.

title: Double or Nothing
description: Jamie is upset over the end of his relationship with Fancy. He vows to begin dating again to prove that he has no lingering feelings for her. Unfortunately, Jamie proves unable to charm women the way he used to--until a chance meeting with a beautiful woman, Nancy (GOLDEN BROOKS), reassures him. Later, however, Jamie is befuddled when he encounters both Fancy and Nancy in the hotel lobby. The others notice the resemblance between the two women and realize that Jamie is in denial.

title: Serve No Wine Before I Get Mine
description: Jamie is frustrated by his lack of success as a singer. He signs a lucrative deal with a major producer (ED LOVER - "Yo! MTV Raps"). However, Jamie discovers that the producer is only fooling him in order to steal Jamie's love song that he wrote for Fancy.

title: Shades of Gray
description: Jamie and Fancy try to be just friends--but that proves harder than it seems.

title: I'll Do It My Dammy.com
description: Jamie imagines that he is in a fantasy world like "The Matrix."

title: Candy Girl
description: Jamie is determined to produce his music video at the hotel. However, Helen objects to the immoral selling of sex that Jamie intends to do. Also, Jamie's diva star refuses to get naked and frolic in whipped cream. After trying to trick the actress into all sorts of lewd conduct, Jamie finally appeases everyone by directing a classier video for his music.

title: Shakin' and Fakin'
description: Jamie fakes illness to gain Fancy's sympathy--but she eventually gets revenge.

title: If the Shoe Fits...
description: Fancy plans to surprise Jamie for his birthday with a pair of autographed basketball shoes from professional basketball player KEVIN M. GARNETT (himself) of the Minnesota Timberwolves. But when Jamie sneaks into Fancy's apartment and finds the shoes under Fancy's bed, he thinks Fancy is having sex with Kevin. Jamie embarrasses Fancy at Kevin's press conference until he learns the truth. Professional basketball player DEREK FISHER also guest stars. Series star JAMIE FOXX directed the episode.

title: Cupid
description: Jamie asks Cupid (GARY COLEMAN) for help winning Fancy's love back.

title: Bachelor Party
description: Jamie and Fancy agree not to have prewedding parties--but they both plan them anyway. Series star JAMIE FOXX makes his directorial debut.

title: East Side Story
description: Helen and Junior make a major announcement about the future--and so does Fancy.

title: Always and Forever
description: In the series finale, Jamie and Fancy prepare for their wedding--but Jamie might not arrive in time. Musical performers GLADYS KNIGHT, GERALD LEVERT, MARILYN McCOO, BILLY DAVIS, JR. and E-40 guest star. JAMES AVERY also guest stars.
